nodes.bodyText:
The new info is great, but the user can't quickly scan to see which settings impact the port. I think some formatting and whitespace would help.
`discovery.seed_hosts`::
+
--
Provides a list of the addresses of the master-eligible nodes in the cluster.
Each address has the format `host:port` or `host`.

The `port` is determined by checking the following settings in order:

. `transport.profiles.default.port`
. `transport.port`

If none of these settings are specified, the port defaults to `9300`.

Note that IPv6 addresses must be bracketed. May also be a single string
containing all the addresses separated by commas. The default value is
`["127.0.0.1", "[::1]"]`. See <<unicast.hosts>>.
--
